name: paco2
description: Partial pressure of carbon dioxide from arterial blood (mm Hg)

name: unit1
description: Administrative identifier for ICU unit (medical ICU); false (0) or true (1)

name: unit2
description: Administrative identifier for ICU unit (surgical ICU); false (0) or true (1)

name: hospadmtime
description: Time between hospital and ICU admission (hours since ICU admission)

name: iculos
description: ICU lenght of stay (hours since ICU admission)

name: sepsislabel
description: For sepsis patients, SepsisLabel is 1 if t >= tsepsis – 6 and 0 if t <= tsepsis – 6. For non-sepsis patients, SepsisLabel is 0
